name: DISCONNECTED (Steedie)
description:
Our game is about a girl named Irene who is suffering from schizophrenia. The game takes the player into a dream world right before Irene is about to shoot herself. The player's goal is to find herself at the end of the dream world to then save herself.

For the Games Jobs live Game Parade Game Jam.

Developed by Steedie, Serena, Zahra.
